title: Frontend Developer
description: Work with React, UI frameworks, and JavaScript to build responsive interfaces.

title: Backend Developer
description: Develop backend APIs using Node.js and AWS services.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Assist in building cloud services as part of the Azure engineering team.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Work across frontend and backend using MERN stack.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze datasets, build dashboards, generate insights.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design wireframes, mockups, and user experiences for products.

title: Cloud Support Engineer
description: Support AWS customers with EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Assist in deep learning model training and GPU optimization.

title: Technical Support Associate
description: Troubleshoot issues, handle tickets, support customers.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Build CI/CD pipelines and manage cloud infrastructure.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Build high-performance mobile apps using React Native.

title: QA Tester
description: Test applications, write bug reports, perform automation testing.
